price: 11. Kaadu Yallay qaraanak lee caddol oobise kinni, tokkel rabte baaxó teetit nuynuwwee, tonnaah qhubuuruk nuwwuk tawqen rabteeniik lakal.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءَۢ بِقَدَرٖ فَأَنشَرۡنَا بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ تُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī nazzala mina al-samāi māan biqadarin fa-ansharnā bihi baldatan maytan kadhālika tukh'rajūna
